'''Pale moss patch''' is a [[feature]] that grows in the [[pale garden]] biome. A large patch consisting of [[pale moss block]]s, [[pale moss carpet]]s, and [[grass]]. A pale moss patch can be created by using [[bone meal]] on pale moss blocks. When [[pale moss block]]s are grown with [[bone meal]], they never contain [[dirt]], [[pale oak sapling]]s, [[flower]]s, or either kind of [[eyeblossom]]s.
